title: Max Bennett (ice hockey)
text: Max Bennett (November 4, 1912 – January 5, 1972) was a <a href="Canadians">Canadian</a> professional <a href="ice%20hockey">ice hockey</a> <a href="Winger%20%28ice%20hockey%29">right winger</a> who played in one <a href="National%20Hockey%20League">National Hockey League</a> game for the <a href="Montreal%20Canadiens">Montreal Canadiens</a> during the <a href="1935%E2%80%9336%20NHL%20season">1935–36 NHL season</a>.
